name: test-automation-platform
description: Automated exploratory testing platform using React and Flask with Gemini AI

scripts.install-deps: pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.setup: python -m venv .venv && .venv/Scripts/activate && pip install -r backend/requirements.txt && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps

author: Test Automation Team
